thread.title: Big profits keep Afghan farmers hooked on opium poppies

title: Big profits keep Afghan farmers hooked on opium poppies
text:
Big profits keep Afghan farmers hooked on opium poppies Monday, April 30, 2018 - 01:12
Afghan farmers are busy in their poppy fields as the annual opium harvest begins, underscoring the government's failure to stamp out a crop that yields much of the world's supply of heroin. Eve Johnson reports.
